comments.author: drguild.2045
comments.body:
One of the things atm I really want in a api using the authenticated system is a achievement tracker.

Much like what you see in game where it fills up and shows you in real time your progress.

This is because I’m currently opening my achievements panel every few minutes to check progress of my dailies etc.

I have a Nexus 10 and was really looking forward to the extended experience Anet promoted around the time of game launch but it seems that project has been discontinued for various reasons and we have this small api thing instead.

One thing I would love to do is use my Nexus 10 as a extended interface allot of games on the xBox One is going this way to have extended interfaces in their games like battlefield and stuff. Even the xBox One interface itself is getting it built in and you can already do something similar with the 360 and the xBox smartglass system.

I know its a long shot this ever being included into the game or the api’s are made to allow the community to do this even though the developers did show there extended experience at one stage.

I’ve been waiting for the extended interface for many pc games for ages to be able to interact view live progress etc all from my nice tablet and with the xBox One games doing it its a nice start but pc needs some lovin to as its going to become a common thing eventually.
